template <typename AT, typename Block, typename LP>
class vsip::impl::Low_level_data_access
File: ../../../vsip/core/extdata_common.hpp

Low-level data access class.

Template parameters:

AT:is a valid data access tag,
Block:is a block that supports the data access interface indicated by AT.
LP:is a layout policy compatible with access tag AT and block Block.

(Each specializtion may provide additional requirements).

Member Functions:
...
Notes:
Low_level_data_access does not hold a block reference/pointer, it is provided to each member function by the caller. This allows the caller to make policy decisions, such as reference counting.
Specializations:
Low_level_data_access<Reorder_access_tag,Block,LP>
Low_level_data_access<Flexible_access_tag,Block,LP>
Low_level_data_access<Direct_access_tag,Block,LP>
Low_level_data_access<Copy_access_tag,Block,LP>
